name: Sandalwood
description: The scent of sandalwood whispers ancient forest secrets, filling the air with grounding calm and sacred warmth.

name: 3 candle hamper
description: Relax, recharge, and gift wellness with our soothing candle set.

name: Rosemarry
description: Rosemary’s fresh herbal notes fill your space with clarity and calm, awakening the senses and uplifting the spirit.

name: Mogra
description: Mogra’s intoxicating fragrance fills the air with serenity and invites the essence of a moonlit garden into your home.

name: Chamomile
description: Chamomile’s gentle touch brings comfort and calm, transforming your space into a sanctuary of peaceful light.

name: Cinnamon
description: Cinnamon’s warm embrace fills the room with cozy sweetness—a homecoming for the senses.

name: Vanilla
description: Vanilla serene floral notes unite, weaving a tapestry of comfort, elegance, and gentle harmony

name: Cedarwood
description: Cedarwood’s rich, woody aroma is a walk through ancient forests—grounding, comforting, and full of quiet strength.

description: Rosea is a walk through ancient forests—grounding, comforting, and full of quiet strength.

name: Petrichor
description: Petrichor captures the refreshing scent of first rain on dry soil—earthy, soothing, and deeply nostalgic.

name: Lavender
description: Lavender is a calming embrace—floral, fresh, and soothing for the mind and soul.
